snippet: Brooklyn and Des Moines will host N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament games for the first time in 2016, and Madison Square Garden will again host a regional during the 2017 tournament.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Brooklyn and Des Moines will host NCAA men’s basketball tournament games for the first time in 2016, and Madison Square Garden will again host a regional during the 2017 tournament; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: Brooklyn and Des Moines will host N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament games for the first time in 2016, and Madison Square Garden will again host a regional during the 2017 tournament.
